question: You might be able to claim some work-related expenses as deductions, but it's important to consult a tax professional for specific advice.

question: Spending money on candy won't exempt you from taxes. Understanding your tax obligations is important, no matter what you buy.

question: As long as you're a citizen of a country that levies taxes, you'll likely have tax obligations—even if you're on the moon!

question: Even with an unusual business, you'll likely have tax obligations. Understanding tax rules can help you avoid any surprises.
